rules_text:
When Horn of Seasons enters, search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Equipped creature gets +3/+0.
Equip {3} [i]({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]Made of blessed cedar, it echoes the firing of Nylea's arrows.[/i]
